bill.title: Promoting Cross-border Energy Infrastructure Act
bill.description: To establish a more uniform, transparent, and modern process to authorize the construction, connection, operation, and maintenance of international border-crossing facilities for the import and export of oil and natural gas and the transmission of electricity.

committee.name: Subcommittee on Railroads, Pipelines, and Hazardous Materials

referrals.name: Subcommittee on Railroads, Pipelines, and Hazardous Materials

history.action: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Transportation and Infrastructure, and Natural Resources, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
